meanings.definition: Excessively proper or precise in behavior or manners.
meanings.sent1: She is the prissiest girl in our class, always sitting up straight and using perfect manners.
meanings.sent2: The prissiest lady at the party refused to eat the cake without a fork.
meanings.sent3: The prissiest cat I've ever seen refused to walk on the grass and only stepped on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: Her prissiest attitude towards cleanliness made her room sparkle like a diamond.
meanings.sent5: The prissiest doll in the collection had a tiny teacup and saucer for pretend tea parties.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive concern with trivial details or propriety.
meanings.sent1: He is the prissiest editor I know, always correcting the smallest punctuation marks.
meanings.sent2: The prissiest teacher in the school insisted on students raising their hands to ask questions.
meanings.sent3: The prissiest squirrel in the park would only eat the shiniest acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her prissiest taste in fashion meant she would only wear designer clothes.
meanings.sent5: The prissiest flower in the garden had petals arranged in perfect symmetry.
